scripts.smoke:admin: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$ErrorActionPreference='Stop'; $frontend='http://127.0.0.1:3000/'; $backend='http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/health/'; try { (Invoke-WebRequest -Uri $frontend -UseBasicParsing -TimeoutSec 5) | Out-Null } catch { throw 'Frontend not reachable at http://127.0.0.1:3000. Start: npm run dev' }; try { (Invoke-WebRequest -Uri $backend -UseBasicParsing -TimeoutSec 5) | Out-Null } catch { throw 'Backend not reachable at http://127.0.0.1:8000. Start: python manage.py runserver 127.0.0.1:8000' }; $env:PW_BASE_URL='http://127.0.0.1:3000'; $env:PW_API_BASE='http://127.0.0.1:8000/api'; npx playwright test admin-smoke admin-crud --project=chromium --timeout=60000"
